name: greetings
summary: A very short first person experience made for a game jam using an environment asset pack. If you want to play a game that we haven't seen anyone able to play longer than 5 minutes, then give this free game a try.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 恐怖游戏
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2017年7月7日
  • 开发商: Charlie Behan, Ciaran Mooney
  • 发行: Charlie Behan
